error.signature: error: Your local changes to the following files would be overwritten by merge (stash pop)
error.regex: CONFLICT.*stash|stash.*conflict|could not restore untracked files from stash

verdict.summary: Stash pop conflicts with current changes. Stash is not dropped on conflict.

dead_ends.action: Force drop the stash: git stash drop
dead_ends.why_fails: Loses the stashed changes — they may still be needed

dead_ends.action: Reset working directory and try again

workarounds.action: Resolve conflicts like a merge — edit files, mark resolved, then git stash drop
workarounds.how:
# After resolving:
git add <resolved-files>
git stash drop

workarounds.action: Use git stash apply instead of pop — apply doesn't auto-drop on success either way

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'error' indicates a conflict when applying a Git stash, while 'Your branch and 'origin/main' have diverged' indicates local and remote branches have diverged.
'error' indicates a conflict when applying a Git stash, while 'Aborting commit due to empty commit message' indicates an aborted async operation.
